page.title: 09Occupations (cont)
page.content: This area is quite pricey and money has been spent on conversions of property, with good views, and this area is quite popular with doctors, solicitors, etc. A number of years ago the 'Jack of all trades' workman were common buying up old property, converting it, then selling up at a good profit. Most of the young people who are not employed on the family farms tend to work in Axminster, Honiton, Seaton or Colyton. To move around young adults tend to have small cars, motor bikes or mopeds, all ideal for the narrow lanes and easy on petrol.
